verses.t: LordIn thee, O {H3068}, do I put my trust{H2620}; let me never{H5769} be ashamed{H954}: deliver{H6403} me in thy righteousness{H6666}.

Bow down{H5186} thine ear{H241} to me; deliver{H5337} me speedily{H4120}: be thou my strong{H4581} rock{H6697}, for an house{H1004} of defence{H4686} to save{H3467} me.my…: Heb. to me for a rock of strength
For thou art my rock{H5553} and my fortress{H4686}; therefore for thy name's{H8034} sake lead{H5148} me, and guide{H5095} me.
Pull me out{H3318} of the net{H7568} that{H2098} they have laid privily{H2934} for me: for thou art my strength{H4581}.
Into thine hand{H3027} I commit{H6485} my spirit{H7307}: thou hast redeemed{H6299} Lordme, O {H3068} God{H410} of truth{H571}.
I have hated{H8130} them that regard{H8104} lying{H7723} vanities{H1892}: but I trust{H982} Lordin the {H3068}.
I will be glad{H1523} and rejoice{H8055} in thy mercy{H2617}: for thou hast considered{H7200} my trouble{H6040}; thou hast known{H3045} my soul{H5315} in adversities{H6869};
And hast not shut me up{H5462} into the hand{H3027} of the enemy{H341}: thou hast set{H5975} my feet{H7272} in a large room{H4800}.
Have mercy{H2603} Lordupon me, O {H3068}, for I am in trouble{H6887}: mine eye{H5869} is consumed{H6244} with grief{H3708}, yea, my soul{H5315} and my belly{H990}.

For my life{H2416} is spent{H3615} with grief{H3015}, and my years{H8141} with sighing{H585}: my strength{H3581} faileth{H3782} because of mine iniquity{H5771}, and my bones{H6106} are consumed{H6244}.

I was a reproach{H2781} among all mine enemies{H6887}, but especially{H3966} among my neighbours{H7934}, and a fear{H6343} to mine acquaintance{H3045}: they that did see{H7200} me without{H2351} fled{H5074} from me.
I am forgotten{H7911} as a dead man{H4191} out of mind{H3820}: I am like a broken{H6} vessel{H3627}.a broken…: Heb. a vessel that perisheth

For I have heard{H8085} the slander{H1681} of many{H7227}: fear{H4032} was on every side{H5439}: while they took counsel{H3245} together{H3162} against me, they devised{H2161} to take away{H3947} my life{H5315}.
But I trusted{H982} Lordin thee, O {H3068}: I said{H559}, Thou art my God{H430}.
My times{H6256} are in thy hand{H3027}: deliver{H5337} me from the hand{H3027} of mine enemies{H341}, and from them that persecute{H7291} me.
Make thy face{H6440} to shine{H215} upon thy servant{H5650}: save{H3467} me for thy mercies'{H2617} sake.
Let me not be ashamed{H954}, LordO {H3068}; for I have called{H7121} upon thee: let the wicked{H7563} be ashamed{H954}, and let them be silent{H1826} in the grave{H7585}.silent…: or, cut off for
Let the lying{H8267} lips{H8193} be put to silence{H481}; which speak{H1696} grievous{H6277} things proudly{H1346} and contemptuously{H937} against the righteous{H6662}.grievous…: Heb. a hard thing

Oh how great{H7227} is thy goodness{H2898}, which thou hast laid up{H6845} for them that fear{H3373} thee; which thou hast wrought{H6466} for them that trust{H2620} in thee before the sons{H1121} of men{H120}!

Thou shalt hide{H5641} them in the secret{H5643} of thy presence{H6440} from the pride{H7407} of man{H376}: thou shalt keep them secretly{H6845} in a pavilion{H5521} from the strife{H7379} of tongues{H3956}.
Blessed{H1288} be Lordthe {H3068}: for he hath shewed me his marvellous{H6381} kindness{H2617} in a strong{H4692} city{H5892}.strong: or, fenced

For I said{H559} in my haste{H2648}, I am cut off{H1629} from before{H5048} thine eyes{H5869}: nevertheless{H403} thou heardest{H8085} the voice{H6963} of my supplications{H8469} when I cried{H7768} unto thee.
O love{H157} Lordthe {H3068}, all ye his saints{H2623}: for Lordthe {H3068} preserveth{H5341} the faithful{H539}, and plentifully{H3499} rewardeth{H7999} the proud{H1346} doer{H6213}.
Be of good courage{H2388}, and he shall strengthen{H553} your heart{H3824}, all ye that hope{H3176} Lordin the {H3068}.
